929720.name: Lawless Lands Heroic Edition DLC
929720.description:
Lawless Lands

Heroic Edition DLC:
  • Digital Artbook - Game Art Which Can Be Used As Desktop Backgrounds & Printed!
  • Digital Lore Book - A Book That Contains A Lengthy Background Story To The Game And Gives Important Relevant Information About The Game World!
  • Digital Theme Songs - The Lawless Lands Theme Songs To Bolster Your Gaming Soundtrack Collection - Artist Christopher McDonough Returns Once Again To Aid Corrosive Studios With All Of Their Soundtrack Needs!
  • "Sellsword" - Exclusive title for your character that can be accessed through the character record book in the inventory!

There are three versions of the Lawless Lands Theme song. The prototype, the original, and the remastered.

*This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and get some cool extras related to the game.
